veteransCrisisLine.callTTY: Call TTY if you have hearing loss:
veteransCrisisLine.connectWithResponders: If you are a Veteran in crisis or concerned about one, connect with our caring, qualified responders for confidential help. Many of them are Veterans themselves.
veteransCrisisLine.title: Veterans Crisis Line
veteransCrisisLine.weAreHereForYou: We’re here anytime, day or night – 24/7
